row.entry: M_InOut.IsSOTrx='Y' AND M_InOut.Processed='N' AND M_InOut.MovementType IN ('C-')
AD_Client_ID=@#AD_Client_ID@ AND AD_User_ID IN (0,@#AD_User_ID@) AND Processed='N' AND AD_BroadcastMessage_ID IS NULL

(SalesRep_ID=@#AD_User_ID@ OR AD_Role_ID=@#AD_Role_ID@) AND Processed='N' AND (DateNextAction IS NULL OR TRUNC(DateNextAction) < = TRUNC(SysDate)) AND (R_Status_ID IS NULL OR R_Status_ID IN (SELECT R_Status_ID FROM R_Status WHERE IsClosed='N'))
